targets.expr: quantile(0.67, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name)(aptos_connections{network_id="Validator", role_type="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace"})) + 1

rate(aptos_vm_txn_gas_usage_sum{kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) / rate(aptos_vm_txn_gas_usage_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator"}[5m])

count(clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0) > 50000) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Connected but not Participating in Consensus

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"}[1m]) - 2 * rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_round{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"}[1m]))

quantile(0.67, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"})

quantile(0.67, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"validator"})

count(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"}  - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"telemetry-service",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"} > 30000)  OR on() vector(0)

panels.description: Number of upstream validator peers a full node can proxy transactions up to
panels.title: Fullnode Upstream Peers

targets.expr: count(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",  role="validator_fullnode", data_type="transactions"}  - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator_fullnode", type="synced"} > 50000)  OR on() vector(0)

panels.description: The error rate of main loop.
panels.title: Error Rate

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

quantile(0.9, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

quantile(0.99, rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m])/rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{stage=~"commit_accepted", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", scope="e2e"}[1m]))

panels.description: The storage synchronizer throughput (versions per second).
panels.title: Validator Syncing throughput

panels.description: The difference between the highest advertised version and the currently synced version.

targets.expr: clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0)

panels.title: Validator Sync lag (behind highest known)
Validator CPU time waiting for IO
